thread.section_title: Homestay.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homestay.com | homestay.com
thread.title: Art

author: Art
title: Art
text: Yoel and his wife were very accommodating. He helped us to secure restaurant and paladares reservations. His wife made delicious breakfasts every day with fresh fruit and juices, eggs, toast, deli, cheese and fresh cafe.. This place is a one minute walk to Malecon and the Caribbean. It is about a 10 minute walk to Parque Central, Museums and Old Habana. They also arranged transportation to and from the airport. This casa is not far from two great paladares: Casa Miglis and La Guardia..
